ygData.subject: going off line
ygData.msgSnippet: Apologies if any of you all get this  more than once but I wanted to let you all know that I will be offline until approximately Thursday.  I have to move this
ygData.messageBody:
Apologies if any of you all get this more than once but I wanted to let you
all know that I will be offline until approximately Thursday. I have to
move this weekend and won't have internet access until ATTBI/Comcast
switches over to the new abode. This move is a bit on short notice for me
(i.e. I found out yesterday) and Luckily a fellow SCA member had an empty
room.

Claude Perry II

SCA : Ld Cynfyn ap Rhydderch MacCulloch (better known as Kwasi)
Deputy Kingdome Constable Lost and Found and Drop Dead Deputy,
Trimaris
Sundial Herald, Trimaris
Deputy Marshall (Rapier), Shire of Castlemere, Trimaris
Captain of the crew for Cutlasses and Corsaires 2003
http://www.castlemere.org/events/cutlasses-corsairs2003.html


Everquest: Halyburton Bearhugger 51 Barbarian Mystic
Illicon 13 High Elf Enchanter
Qapmoc 11 Half Elf Ranger
Doktari 11 High Elf Cleric
